title: Shopify App package for Remix
description: The @shopify/shopify-app-remix package enables Remix apps to authenticate with Shopify and make API calls. It uses [App Bridge](/docs/api/app-bridge-library) to enable apps to embed themselves in the Shopify Admin.

sections.title: Setup
sections.sectionContent:
1. Run one of the example commands to install the package.
1. To learn more about using the package, see the Build an app Guide.

sections.title: Authentication
sections.sectionContent:
The Remix app package will handle authenticating requests coming from Shopify. It can validate requests coming from Shopify Admin, webhooks or checkout extensions.

For more information, see the guides below.
